content.question: The seated boxer was created using which of the following techniques?

choices.label: Lost-wax casting to mold bronze into a hollow form of the figure
Applying thin sheets of metal to a wooden core carved in the shape of the figure
Molding metal into a solid form in the shape of the figure, then adding enamel
Hammering a sheet of bronze into the shape of the figure, then inlaying gold details

content.answer: Lost-wax casting to mold bronze into a hollow form of the figure

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
